body: I thought is was NTR and the wife did not care, but since the husband is not even paying attention to her? Then I cannot blame her. Do not ignore a wife that loves you and wants to do it with you.

How the fuck did you say this is shit art? Just because you don't like the artsyle doesn't mean the art is always bad. You need to see at least the fluidity of the gesture, contour line, proportion and shadowing to judge it and in this doujin, while some of these aspects are obviously exaggerated (because it's manga), the amount of exaggeration are still decent enough to be called "good art". If you want to criticize something, better to learn it first you goddamn uncultured coomer.
CulturedMan123 or should i call u Sonofastupidbitch
Zaki, you son of a bitch, i'm in
